name: TreeView.Root
description: A component that is used to show a tree hierarchy.
description_zh: A component that is used to show a tree hierarchy.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultExpandedValue.description:
The initial expanded items of the tree view.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the tree view.
defaultExpandedValue.description_zh:
树状图的初始展开项。
当您不需要控制树视图的状态时，请使用此选项。

defaultSelectedValue.description:
The initial selected items of the tree view.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the tree view.
defaultSelectedValue.description_zh:
树状图的初始选定项。
当您不需要控制树视图的状态时，请使用此选项。

expandedValue.description: The id of the expanded nodes

expandOnClick.description: Whether clicking on a branch should open it or not
expandOnClick.description_zh: 单击分支是否应打开它

focusedValue.description: The id of the focused node

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the tree elements. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 树元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

selectedValue.description: The id of the selected nodes

selectionMode.description:
Whether the tree supports multiple selection
- "single": only one node can be selected
- "multiple": multiple nodes can be selected
selectionMode.description_zh:
树是否支持多选
- “single”：只能选择一个节点
- “multiple”：可以选择多个节点

typeahead.description: Whether the tree supports typeahead search
typeahead.description_zh: 树是否支持 typeahead 搜索
